Install CBA¶

  1. Create a virtual environment
  2. Install Django
  3. Create a new Django project

4. Add SESSION_SERIALIZER 3. Install CBA

$ pip install https://github.com/diefenbach/cba/archive/master.zip

  1. Add CBA to your installed apps
  2. migrate

SESSION_SERIALIZER = ‘django.contrib.sessions.serializers.PickleSerializer’

Install the Notes reference application¶

1. Install cba-notes 1. Add settings middleware 2. Add URL 3. migrate 5. create superuser 4. runserver
